Create a virtual reality experience that allows users to explore different terrains andisations while riding a virtual bicycle.

Develop a mobile app that uses augmented reality to enhance the user's bicycle experience, such as providing real-time speed and distance data, as well as information about local landmarks and attractions.
Design a smart bicycle that can be controlled remotely using a smartphone or tablet, allowing users to customize the ride and adjust the settings.
Develop a bicycle-sharing platform that uses blockchain technology to ensure secure and transparent transactions, making it easier for users to rent and return bicycles.
Create a bicycle-powered generator that can be used to charge electronic devices, providing a sustainable and eco-friendly energy source.
